name: Flavor Personality
title: What Flavor of the Day Are You?
description: Classic personality quiz with custard-trait scoring and local availability matching.

questions.prompt: What color best describes your mood?

options.label: Mint green
options.commentary: Mint green -- cool, fresh, a little zen

options.label: Caramel gold
options.commentary: Caramel gold -- warm, reliable, classic through and through

options.label: Berry red
options.commentary: Berry red -- bold feelings, big heart energy

options.label: Dark espresso
options.commentary: Dark espresso -- intense, focused, no time for decaf

options.label: Salted nuts
options.commentary: Salted nuts -- practical, satisfying, no frills needed

options.label: Chocolate anything
options.commentary: Chocolate anything says you go straight for the good stuff

options.label: Fresh fruit
options.commentary: Fresh fruit -- light, bright, keeping things interesting

options.label: Cookies and cream
options.commentary: Cookies and cream -- you like sharing and everyone likes you

questions.prompt: You joined your favorite band. What do you play?

options.label: Drums
options.commentary: Drums -- pure energy, you set the pace for everyone

options.label: Bass
options.commentary: Bass -- the understated backbone, quietly essential

options.label: Guitar
options.commentary: Guitar -- a little flash, a little soul, always in the mix

options.label: Bagpipes
options.commentary: Bagpipes?! Now THAT is a personality statement

questions.prompt: If you could be an animal, what would you be?

options.label: Owl
options.commentary: Owl -- wise, watchful, sees what others miss

options.label: Fox
options.commentary: Fox -- clever, quick, always finding the interesting path

options.label: Golden retriever
options.commentary: Golden retriever energy -- loyal, warm, everyone's favorite

options.label: Dolphin
options.commentary: Dolphin -- playful, smart, riding the wave

questions.prompt: What is your favorite meal moment?

options.label: Slow breakfast
options.commentary: Slow breakfast tells me you savor every moment

options.label: Fast lunch run
options.commentary: Fast lunch run -- efficiency is its own kind of art

options.label: Dinner out with friends
options.commentary: Dinner with friends -- the meal is just an excuse to gather

options.label: Late-night snack quest
options.commentary: Late-night snack quest -- you live for the adventure

questions.prompt: On a road trip, your default role is...

options.label: Driver and navigator
options.commentary: Driver and navigator -- reliable and in control

options.label: DJ with perfect playlists
options.commentary: DJ duty -- your vibe sets the pace

options.label: Detour finder
options.commentary: Detour finder -- the fun is off the main route

options.label: Snack architect
options.commentary: Snack architect -- comfort and planning in one move

options.label: Long deep-focus blocks
options.commentary: Deep-focus blocks -- precision over noise

options.label: Fast short sprints
options.commentary: Fast sprints -- momentum is everything

options.label: Collaborative brainstorms
options.commentary: Collaborative sessions -- ideas get better together

options.label: Steady daily cadence
options.commentary: Steady cadence -- consistency wins over drama

options.label: Order your known favorite
options.commentary: Known favorite -- trusted classics never miss

options.label: Pick the richest option
options.commentary: Richest option -- all in, no half measures

options.label: Split two desserts
options.commentary: Split two -- sharing and variety over rules

options.label: Try the seasonal special
options.commentary: Seasonal special -- curiosity beats routine

options.label: Rulebook expert
options.commentary: Rulebook expert -- structure keeps it fun

options.label: Hype captain
options.commentary: Hype captain -- your energy lifts the room

options.label: Risky bluffer
options.commentary: Risky bluffer -- no one can predict your next move

options.label: Host and peacekeeper
options.commentary: Host and peacekeeper -- warm and grounded

options.label: Journal + long walk
options.commentary: Journal walk -- reflective and intentional

options.label: Big spontaneous adventure
options.commentary: Big adventure -- say yes first, plan second

options.label: Dinner party with friends
options.commentary: Dinner party -- warmth and conversation

options.label: Finish a personal project
options.commentary: Project day -- satisfying progress over chaos

options.label: Taste and adjust as you go

questions.prompt: How do you make big decisions?
